motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of October 28, 2024 meeting minutes, Stage Door Players legal entity change, skate park mural surplus, and materials testing contract.

motions.title: Remove Treetop Quest Item from Table
motions.description: Motion to remove the Treetop Quest Dunwoody Renewal Agreement from the table (previously tabled at 10.28.24 meeting).

motions.title: Treetop Quest Dunwoody Renewal Agreement
motions.description: Approval of Treetop Quest renewal agreement after addressing safety incident concerns.

motions.title: SLUP 24-01 Starbucks Drive-Through (Second Read)
motions.description: Second read approval of Special Land Use Permit for Starbucks drive-through facility at 140 Perimeter Center West.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for litigation and real estate discussion.
